title: Appeal of TE John Evans v. Arizona Presbytery
parties: TE John Evans v. Arizona Presbytery
source: Case 2023-07: Appeal of TE John Evans v. Arizona Presbytery, M51GA, 2024, 2074-2086
tags: Appeals, Ministerial Transfers, Jurisdiction, Presbytery, Authority of, Withdrawal from the PCA, Membership Vows, Judicial Procedure
summary: This case involves the appeal of TE John Evans against Arizona Presbytery's action to divest him of his office without censure due to his lack of call for a prolonged period of time, not exceeding three years, despite TE Evans’ notification to AZP (on July 21, 2022) that since June 12, 2022 he had affiliated with the Evangelical Presbyterian Church in England and Wales.
